game.title: Pocketro
game.description: Pocketro is a fast-paced roguelike card game that fuses poker mechanics with strategic deck-building. You'll craft winning hands, collect random power-ups, and face tougher challenges with each round. Every decision shapes your run, making each session unpredictable and rewarding. Test your instincts, take risks, and outsmart the table in a game of clever gambits.

features.title: Multiple Characters
features.description: Choose from a variety of unique characters, each with their own special abilities and playstyles.

features.title: Weapon System
features.description: Collect and upgrade various weapons to create powerful combinations.

features.title: Level Up System
features.description: Gain experience and level up to unlock new abilities and enhance your character.

features.title: Boss Battles
features.description: Face challenging boss battles that will test your skills and strategy.
